extracted_text:
For Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd. (M&M) on August 25, 2025, there are two significant corporate developments :

Mahindra Sustenappoints Avinash Rao as new CEO:M&M's cleantech subsidiary, Mahindra Susten, announced the appointment of Avinash Rao as its new Managing Director & Chief Executive Officer, effective September 24, 2025.

M&M surpasses Hyundai to become India's second-largest carmaker:M&M overtook Hyundai to become the second-largest carmaker in India, ending Hyundai's 25-year hold on that position. This was driven by strong sales of both its internal combustion engine (ICE) and electric vehicle (EV) models, including the XUV 3XO, Thar, and BE 6.
